content.question: The author’s inclusion of the phrase “tend to” in paragraph 2, sentence 1 (“We . . . questions”) serves primarily to

choices.label: emphasize the futility of a particular behavior
qualify a claim about a widely held preference
imply a link to a commonly asked question
highlight a criticism of a frequent generalization

content.answer: qualify a claim about a widely held preference

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain ways claims are qualified through modifiers, counterarguments, and alternative perspectives.
